actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Edison Birthplace National Historic Site.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire such lands and interests as are necessary for the purpose of establishing the Edison Birthplace National Historic Site, Milan, Ohio. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as are necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Edison Birthplace National Historic Site.
